interpretation: The "person: white hair" card represents wisdom, experience, and maturity. This individual has lived a long life and has gained valuable insights through their years of experience. They have a deep understanding of the world around them and can offer valuable guidance to those who seek their advice. This card also symbolizes the passing of time and the inevitability of aging. It encourages us to embrace our own aging process and to value the knowledge and perspective that comes with it.
